name: Trash Fish
description:
This is a game for the #TeamSeas game jam, the objective is to eat up all the garbage and then reach the goal, while avoiding fishes.

The game is playable on Windows, Linux, Android, Mac OSx, and Switch.

The Switch version is not indorsed by nintendo in anyway and only runs on homebrewed devices.


Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
